short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension changes the words 'racially charged' to 'racist' when the former are used to describe racism online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The words "racially charged" are often used to describe racism online. This extension will simply replace these instances with the word "racist."
